params.indices: The indices of the claims in the Merkle tree.
params.merkleProofs: The Merkle proofs for each index.
params.totalAmounts: The total amounts allocated for each index.

params.index: The index of the claim in the Merkle tree.
params.totalAmount: The total amount allocated for this index.

returns._0: claimedAmount The amount already claimed for this index.

returns.timeRemaining: The number of seconds remaining, 0 if ended.

returns.active: True if the current time is within the claim window.

params.index: The index to check in the Merkle tree.
params.totalAmount: The total amount allocated for this index.

returns._0: claimed True if the index has been fully claimed, false otherwise.
The Merkle root for verifying airdrop claims.
The human-readable name of the airdrop.
The timestamp when claims can begin.

params.to: The address to send the withdrawn tokens to.

batchClaim(uint256[],uint256[],bytes32[].notice: Claims multiple airdrop allocations for the caller in a single transaction.

claim(uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Claims an airdrop allocation for the caller.

endTime().notice: Returns the end time when claims are no longer available.

getClaimedAmount(uint256).notice: Gets the amount already claimed for a specific index.

getTimeRemaining().notice: Returns the time remaining until the airdrop starts (if not started) or ends (if active).

isActive().notice: Checks if the airdrop is currently active (within the time window).

isClaimed(uint256,uint256).notice: Checks if a claim has been fully claimed for a specific index.

merkleRoot().notice: Returns the Merkle root for verifying airdrop claims.

name().notice: Returns the name of this airdrop.

startTime().notice: Returns the start time when claims become available.

token().notice: Returns the token being distributed in this airdrop.

withdrawTokens(address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any tokens remaining in the contract.

userdoc.notice: Interface for time-bound airdrop contracts in the ATK Protocol.

devdoc.author: SettleMint Tokenization Services
devdoc.details: Defines the functions specific to time-bound airdrops where claims are restricted to a specific time window.
